alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chippewa and Mackinac Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Bayview Campground to 12 miles northwest of Garden Corners. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Curtis, Hulbert, Strongs, Bayview Campground and Eckerman around 505 PM EDT. Raco around 510 PM EDT. Corinne, Engadine and Gould City around 515 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Rexton, Gilchrist, Garnet, Naubinway, Trout Lake, Fibre and Rudyard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
